data.title: Roser Visiting Artists
data.meta_description: Roser Visiting Artist Residencies include not only
data.text:
Roser Visiting Artist Residencies include not only public performances, but also workshops and collaborations with CU students. As the program has been running since 1994, many excellent artists have come to CU though this grant. Some past Artists have included:

2020:

Christopher Theofanidis (Music)

SoloDuo (Music)

Roscoe Mitchell (Music)

Daniel de Borah Chamber Music (Music)

jumatatu m. poe (Dance)

2019:

Dave Holland (Music)

Pittsburgh New Music Ensemble (Music)

Pierre-Laurent Aimard (Music)

Dr. L Subramaniam (Music)

Victor Quijada (Dance)

2018:

Claudia Lavista (Dance)

Jack Heggie (Music)

Warren Jones (Music)

Yoshi Ishikawa (Music)

2017:

Jan Kagarice (Music)

Michelle DeYoung (Opera)

The Nile Project (Music)

Anthem for the Ancestors (Music)

Mark LaPore (Film)

Emmanuel Sejourne (Music)

Sir James and Lady Galway (Music)

Ana Prada (Dance)

Coming soon: a fuller listing of past artists, including descriptions, photos and videos of their work with CU students.
